subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: This Ryder Cup will be the first in Scotland in 41 years, and the only Scot who will be playing is Stephen Gallacher, a 39-year-old rookie who required a captain’s pick to make it to Gleneagles.
snippet: This Ryder Cup will be the first in Scotland in 41 years, and the only Scot who will be playing is Stephen Gallacher, a 39-year-old rookie who required a captain’s pick to make it to Gleneagles.
